refnamediv.refpurpose: grants, revoke rights on the specified node

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: karights grants or revoke the right on nodes

refsect1.title: OPTIONS
refsect1.para: -l, --login login the login of the user. This option can be used more than once to specify several users. By default, the deployment rights are granted to all the users.
-m, --machine hostname specifies a host. This option can be used more than once to specify several hosts. By default, the deployment rights are granted for all the nodes.
-r, --rights the right you want to give or revoke.

refsect1.title: RIGHTS
refsect1.para: PXE: read/write the pxe boot of the node
CONSOLE: connection to the serial console
DISK1: you can overwrite the MBR
DISKX_PARTY: you can mkfs the partition Y of the disk X

refsect1.title: RETURN VALUE
refsect1.para: karights returns 1 if it fails. Otherwise, it returns 0.

refsect1.title: EXAMPLE
refsect1.para: karights -l titi -r DISK1_PART3 -m node1 grants rights to user titi on node "node1" on partition 3
